OOC: Hmmm, true. Hot Rdo never did kill Unicron in the movie. His body
was destroyed and the head left in Cybertron orbit was sevearly damaged.
But in the third season of G1 (TF: 2010 in Japan) he twice tryed to
restore his body, and in one ep restored StarScream to life.
(Some how StarScream's body was again destroyed before his Beast Wars
appearance. Ok thats the end of my G1 rant.
